products.name: Risotto  safran
products.facts: ["Risotto saffron is traditionally made with Arborio rice, known for its high starch content which creates a creamy texture.","Saffron, the key ingredient, is derived from the flower of Crocus sativus and requires around 150,000 flowers to produce just one kilogram of saffron, making it one of the most expensive spices in the world.","The cultivation of saffron is labor-intensive and often done in environmentally sensitive areas, requiring careful management to prevent soil degradation.","Quality saffron can be identified by its deep red color, strong aroma, and the ability to impart a vibrant yellow hue to dishes when cooked."]

products.name: Organic Plain Yogurt
products.facts: ["Made from organic milk sourced from cows that are not treated with antibiotics or growth hormones.","Produced using sustainable farming practices that promote soil health and biodiversity.","Contains live active cultures that are beneficial for gut health and digestion.","Free from artificial preservatives, flavors, and sweeteners, ensuring a natural product."]

products.name: Ramen Porc Tonkotsu
products.facts: ["Made with high-quality pork bones for rich flavor.","Packaging is recyclable to reduce environmental impact.","Contains no artificial preservatives or colors.","Sourced from sustainable farming practices."]

products.name: Organic Triple Berry Blend
products.facts: ["Made from a mix of organic strawberries, blueberries, and raspberries.","Grown without synthetic pesticides or fertilizers, promoting healthier soil and ecosystems.","Frozen at peak ripeness to preserve nutrients and flavor.","Packaged in environmentally friendly materials to reduce plastic waste."]

products.name: Chex mix
products.facts: ["Chex Mix typically contains a blend of Chex cereal, pretzels, nuts, and seasonings.","Many of the ingredients in Chex Mix are made from whole grains, contributing to dietary fiber intake.","The packaging for Chex Mix is often recyclable, promoting ecological sustainability.","Chex Mix is made without artificial flavors in many varieties, ensuring a higher quality snack option."]

products.facts: ["Toddy - 370g is made from high-quality, food-grade materials that ensure safety and durability.","The packaging is designed to be eco-friendly, minimizing environmental impact during production and disposal.","Toddy - 370g is produced using sustainable practices that reduce carbon footprint and promote ecological balance.","The product undergoes rigorous quality control processes to ensure consistency and excellence in every batch."]
